overview: after stealing $100,000 from crime boss "the collector" (ollie early) and running away from a life of crime, Tyler (angus sharp) is kidnapped by the collector and his gang, he gives him one option "to get the money in 7 days or else". Tyler has to find a way to survive this high pressure situation in a short amount of time.
tagline: get the cash or confirm the kill
title: Criminal decision
